meanings.definition: A person or thing that scatters.
meanings.sent1: The scatterer of breadcrumbs attracted a flock of birds.
meanings.sent2: The wind acted as a scatterer of fallen petals.
meanings.sent3: The scatterer of toys in the room was the mischievous toddler.
meanings.sent4: The scatterer of paint splattered colors across the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The scatterer of joy brought smiles to everyone around.
